name: Kaiser (itch) (YannAnnaert)
description:
Kaiser

Go on a campaign to dethrone the kaiser! Build an army , strengthen yourself with powerful artefacts and defeat the forces he sends to stop you. Kaiser is a casual roguelike game where you fight thousands of enemies in an attempt to become the new kaiser. 

Gameplay:

Try to defeat the enemies wandering the land to gain XP and level up your character. Enemies may drop artefacts that allow you to become more powerful in various ways. These enemies may in fact drop an artefact of them self, allowing you to implement a unit of their race in you own forces. Defeat the grand armies send your way. The last army send your way will that of the kaiser. The kaiser's army being the army of the last time you won the game.

Demo version:
  • 4 Characters limit
  • 1 Biome Limit
  • 5 Unique artefacts
  • Access to customizable world options
  • 1 Level
  • Full version will be available on steam!
Controls:
  • WASD: Move around
  • E: Pick up artefacts
  • Mouse click: Level up unit slot
  • Mouse Drag : drag artefacts from inventory to unit slot
  • Shift: Guide units to mouse
  • Esc: Quit
